title: Score Beats Studio Buds for a third off
description: Amazon's latest Beats Studio Buds deal takes 33% off the price. And if you get a discount on upgraded Beats Studio Buds+. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: David Snow
excerpt: Amazon's latest Beats Studio Buds deal takes 33% off the price. And if you get a discount on upgraded Beats Studio Buds+.
text: Daily deals These are very solid noise-canceling earbuds for $100. Photo: Apple Need great wireless earbuds but not into spending hundred of dollars? Amazon is currently selling Beats Studio Buds for the uncommonly low price of $149.95 $99.95, or 33% off. And you can get the upgraded Beats Studio Buds+ for $169.95 $149.95, or 12% off, if you prefer. See below. This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. Beats Studio Buds deal: One third off at Amazon Great for Apple or Android Beats Studio Buds These true wireless noise cancelling earbuds are compatible with Apple and Android. They feature a built-in microphone, IPX4 water and dust resistance rating and Class 1 Bluetooth for good connectivity. Pros:Comfortable fit and good soundWorks well with Apple or Android devicesClass 1 Bluetooth Cons:Not the newest or best from Apple/Beats Beats Studio Buds make a great choice of active noise cancelling (ANC) wireless earbud. As Beats by Dre is owned by Apple, the buds pair with Apple devices as easily as AirPods do and sound great. Beats Studio Buds features: Custom acoustic platform delivers balanced sound. Control your sound with two distinct listening modes: Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode. Three soft eartip sizes offer a stable and comfortable fit while ensuring an optimal acoustic seal. Up to 8 hours of listening time (up to 24 hours combined with pocket-sized charging case) Class 1 Bluetooth gives extended range and fewer dropouts. High-quality call performance and voice assistant interaction via built-in microphones. IPX4-rated sweat and water resistant wireless earbuds Compatible with Apple and Android devices Buy from: Amazon  Beats Studio Buds+ With Beats Studio Buds+, we love the transparent color choicePhoto: Apple For an even better earbuds option — though not a better deal — look to Amazon’s 12% off discount on Beats Studio Buds+. They’re newer and added a cool transparent look on one of the color choices (black, ivory, or various custom editions). And beyond original Beats Studio Buds, they jack up active noise cancellation (ANC) and lengthen battery life (from the original’s 24 hours with charging case to 36 hours). The upgraded buds will feature ANC with up to 1.6 times more power than regular Beats Studio Buds, as well as double the transparency mode capability. That’s helped by microphones tripled in size over the previous model, new vents and a more powerful processor, according to the listing. Studio Buds+ offer one-touch pairing for Apple and Android devices, spatial audio and touch controls. Note that the box below may not reflect current discount. html:
• Daily deals

Need great wireless earbuds but not into spending hundred of dollars? Amazon is currently selling Beats Studio Buds for the uncommonly low price of $149.95 $99.95, or 33% off. And you can get the upgraded Beats Studio Buds+ for $169.95 $149.95, or 12% off, if you prefer. See below.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

Beats Studio Buds deal: One third off at Amazon

Great for Apple or Android

Beats Studio Buds

These true wireless noise cancelling earbuds are compatible with Apple and Android. They feature a built-in microphone, IPX4 water and dust resistance rating and Class 1 Bluetooth for good connectivity.

Pros:

  • Comfortable fit and good sound
  • Works well with Apple or Android devices
  • Class 1 Bluetooth

Cons:

  • Not the newest or best from Apple/Beats

Beats Studio Buds make a great choice of active noise cancelling (ANC) wireless earbud. As Beats by Dre is owned by Apple, the buds pair with Apple devices as easily as AirPods do and sound great.

Beats Studio Buds features:

  • Custom acoustic platform delivers balanced sound.
  • Control your sound with two distinct listening modes: Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode.
  • Three soft eartip sizes offer a stable and comfortable fit while ensuring an optimal acoustic seal.
  • Up to 8 hours of listening time (up to 24 hours combined with pocket-sized charging case)
  • Class 1 Bluetooth gives extended range and fewer dropouts.
  • High-quality call performance and voice assistant interaction via built-in microphones.
  • IPX4-rated sweat and water resistant wireless earbuds
  • Compatible with Apple and Android devices

Buy from: Amazon 

Beats Studio Buds+

For an even better earbuds option — though not a better deal — look to Amazon’s 12% off discount on Beats Studio Buds+. They’re newer and added a cool transparent look on one of the color choices (black, ivory, or various custom editions). And beyond original Beats Studio Buds, they jack up active noise cancellation (ANC) and lengthen battery life (from the original’s 24 hours with charging case to 36 hours).

The upgraded buds will feature ANC with up to 1.6 times more power than regular Beats Studio Buds, as well as double the transparency mode capability. That’s helped by microphones tripled in size over the previous model, new vents and a more powerful processor, according to the listing.

Studio Buds+ offer one-touch pairing for Apple and Android devices, spatial audio and touch controls. Note that the box below may not reflect current discount.

Beats Studio Buds +

The Beats Studio Buds+ stand out for their translucent design, while delivering impressive sound quality thanks to Beats' custom acoustic platform.

Pros:

  • Compatible with Android and iPhone
  • Useful transparency mode

Cons:

  • No wireless charging
  • No EQ customization

Buy from: Amazon
